input_text:
Job Title: Press Assistant

Location: Maple Grove, MN

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Marketing, Public Relations, Writing/Editing

Description:
Shift: This role is 4th Shift, 7:00 PM-7:00 AM

Hourly Rate: $23.90 an hour + $0.75 shift differential

Shift Schedule

Scheduled to work 12 hour shifts from 7pm - 7am every Wednesday and Thursday, and every other Friday, Saturday, Sunday, which is a 2 week pattern of 2 days on, 5 days off, 5 days on, 2 days off. off. Every other weekend is scheduled work time. Only scheduled to work 15 days every month, but with built-in overtime pay!

Pay Rate: up to $23.90

Position Summary

Assist press operator with printing press operations and related equipment to meet all safety, quality and production standards. You will report to the Cell Lead and will receive work direction from the Shift Lead and Press Operator onsite in our Maple Grove facility.

Position Responsibilities

You are a role model for safety and encourage fellow employees to work safely. Must complete monthly safety, engagement and training activities and be willing to work in a culture built around continuous improvement and change.You are a mentor to upskill and train new and developing employees.You will remove completed rolls from rewind.You will need to push paper roll carts into loading position at press.You will assist the operator in preventative maintenance of equipment expectations. Support the operator to maintain the press and all related equipment which may include adjusting ink color, ink and glue viscosity and levels, web the press, to meet safety, quality, 5S, production and shift-end expectations.Visually inspect product (printed roll stock and roll formation) at rewind station to assure quality standards for color, registration, patches, print and moisture levels.Assist in root cause analysis to aid Press operator in resolving problems.Enter information into SAP computer system.Check written descriptions of paper rolls and other raw materials to ensure correct material supply at the unwind stands and prepare for splicing.Maintain written production and inventory usage records.Other responsibilities as assigned.


Qualifications/ Education/Experience

Interpret common internal reports and supporting documents.Able to lift and carry up to 45 - 55 pounds routinely.Climb ladders, reach, and stand frequently.Unrestricted color perceptionExperience in a manufacturing environment.


Anticipated Close Date: June 15, 2024

Location: Maple Grove, Minnesota

Our Benefits

We care about your total well-being and will support you with the following, subject to your location and role:

Health: Medical, dental and vision insurance, company-paid life, accident and disability insuranceWealth: great pay, 401(k) and stock purchase planGrowth: online courses, virtual and on-site development experiencesBalance: paid-time off


Our Company

Conagra Brands is one of North America's leading branded food companies. Guided by an entrepreneurial spirit, our Company combines a rich heritage of making great food with a sharpened focus on innovation. Our portfolio is evolving to satisfy people's changing food preferences. Our iconic brands, such as Birds Eye, Duncan Hines, Healthy Choice, Marie Callender's, Reddi-wip, and Slim Jim, and emerging brands, including Angie's BOOMCHICKAPOP, Duke's, Earth Balance, Gardein, and Frontera, offer choices for every occasion.

We pride ourselves on having the most impactful, energized and inclusive culture in the food industry. For more information, visit www.conagrabrands.com.

Conagra Brands is an equal opportunity employer and considers qualified applicants for employment without regard to sex, race, color, religion, ethnic or national origin, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, age, pregnancy, leave status, disability, veteran status, genetic information and/or any other characteristic or status protected by national, federal, state or local law.

Experience Level (if available): None

Assist in preventative maintenance of equipment
Support operator to maintain press and related equipment
Enter information into SAP computer system
Check written descriptions of paper rolls
Maintain written production and inventory usage records

Growth: online courses, virtual and on-site development experiences
